_sText:
Tier 6
4 Stages
6 Bonuses

Short, technical, and spinny map with some bhops. It is on the easy end of tier 6 and is about 40 seconds long to nofail.

The detailing is inspired by art deco elements in Fallout and Bioshock games. The name of the map was intially going to have a lot more influence on the theme, but the direction changed quite a bit, leaving only the little icons of bugs on the walls of each stage.

server/zone configuration:

The only non-standard zone is the stage 4 start zone. It should be a drop zone covering the room at the level of the walkable floor.

The stages and bonuses have trigger_multiple zones following this naming scheme:
s1start
s2start
s3start
s4start
s4end
b1start
b1end
etc...

b3 endzone is the same name of b3 startzone by mistake

Autobhop zones are trigger_multiple zones named autobhop.
